title: Prohibits issuance of a license for the retail sale of alcoholic beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any premises with a drive-through facility
summary: Prohibits the issuance of a license for the retail sale of alcoholic beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any premises with a drive-up or drive-through facility.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to prohibiting the granting of a license for the retail sale of alcohol beverages for on-premises or off-premises consumption to any premises upon which there exists a drive-up or drive-through facility
